Metadata.title: Yaong-i Chat
Metadata.description: A whimsical cat-run chat lounge where Korean, Japanese, and English threads curl up together.

Marketing.heroDescription: Yaong-i is a playful, cat-themed chat home where Korean, Japanese, and English friends lounge together. Cozy gradients, soft paw animations, and instant translation keep every thread feeling like a shared windowsill.
Marketing.whyTitle: A cat-curated social lounge for every surface.
Marketing.whyDescription: OLED-friendly darks, gentle glows, and paw-print accents let photos and stickers pop while Yaong-i keeps the vibe soft and feline.

fluid.title: Purr-fect translation
fluid.description: Yaong-i perks its ears for Korean, Japanese, and English lines, translating them side-by-side so every friend keeps pace.

signals.title: Soft paw moderation
signals.description: Gentle nudges, auto-muting, and mood summaries keep your rooms cozy while our mascot keeps watch.

integrations.title: Cat toys & add-ons
integrations.description: Drop playlists, ambient sounds, or AR cat ears into the thread without app juggling.

Marketing.testimonialQuote: ‚ÄúYaong-i feels like a sleepy cat weaving between us‚Äîsuddenly everyone‚Äôs relaxed and ready to share in three languages.‚Äù
Marketing.testimonialAttribution: Hana K. ¬∑ Seoul ‚Üî Osaka group chat host

encrypted.title: Private by default
encrypted.description: End-to-end encryption and region-based storage keep every secret tucked under Yaong-i‚Äôs paw.

insights.title: See the vibe at a glance
insights.description: Heatmaps, streak counters, and translation stats show when the lounge needs another playful ping.

chatMessages.syncPause: Morning pride! Rooftop sunbeam later? I‚Äôll bring the milk tea.
chatMessages.ledgerUpdate: Yes!! Need to feed the actual cat first, then I‚Äôm in. DM the room link.
chatMessages.jobRestarted: Dropped it‚Äîplus a playlist of purring beats so we stay focused.

Marketing.ctaTitle: Let Yaong-i host your multilingual cat chat.
Marketing.ctaDescription: Spin up a room, choose a feline theme, and invite friends across time zones. Translation, reactions, and paw-sitive vibes are built in.

footer.copy: ¬© {year} Yaong-i Chat. Built for night-owl and cat-nap chats everywhere.

lightMode.label: Light mode
lightMode.description: Swap to airy whites and warm grays.

errors.signInFailed: We couldn‚Äôt sign you in with those details. Try again.

metadata.title: About Yaong-i Chat
metadata.description: We build a cat-themed multilingual chat space for day-one friends and far-away family.

About.title: About Yaong-i Chat
About.description: We‚Äôre obsessed with building a cat-comfy place for conversations that span oceans.

paragraphs.craft: Yaong-i began as a mascot doodle for our Seoul, Tokyo, and LA friend groups. The cat stuck‚Äînow the UI leans into velvety blacks so photos, stickers, and whisker doodles pop on any screen.
paragraphs.orchestration: Translation layers, shared playlists, and memory reels are woven in so you can glide between Korean, Japanese, and English without breaking the feline flow.
paragraphs.mission: We‚Äôre a tiny distributed crew chasing warmth over vanity metrics. Mission: help people feel close, keep communities kind, and let a playful cat spirit guide late-night chats.

metadata.description: Clean monochrome canvas for streaming, journaling, or sharing your screen.

Capture.srText: Frosted background capture surface for recordings.

metadata.title: Contact | Yaong-i Chat
metadata.description: Say hi anytime. We keep the lantern on for the Yaong-i community.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: We keep a friendly inbox for feedback, ideas, and support.
Contact.intro: Pick the channel that fits your vibe. Someone from our crew will respond across time zones.

email.label: Email

community.label: Community

Support.title: Support options
Support.description: From casual questions to community-sized events, we‚Äôve got you.

enterprise.title: Community

metadata.title: Terms of Service | Yaong-i Chat
metadata.description: Understand the ground rules for keeping Yaong-i safe and friendly.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.description: Plain-language promises about availability, data ownership, and respectful behavior.

body.commitment: You own the photos, messages, and memories you share. We deliver 99.95% uptime, give heads-up before major changes, and remove content that breaks our community guidelines.
body.customAgreements: Need something special for a large community? Reach out to

metadata.title: Privacy Policy | Yaong-i Chat
metadata.description: See how Yaong-i Chat protects and processes your data.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.description: We encrypt, minimize, and guard the conversations entrusted to us.

body.storage: Yaong-i stores messages in region-specific clusters with envelope encryption and strict access controls. You can request exports or deletion anytime, and we honor data requests within 72 hours.

metadata.title: Status | Yaong-i Chat
metadata.description: Live view into Yaong-i Chat uptime and maintenance windows.

Status.title: Service status
Status.description: Snapshots refresh every 60 seconds. Subscribe for push or email updates.

metadata.title: Integrations | Yaong-i Chat
metadata.description: Connect music, games, and creative tools that make every chat feel alive.

Integrations.title: Integrations
Integrations.description: A few cat-approved add-ons Yaong-i hosts plug into their rooms.

bevy.description: Stream shared gaming sessions or watch parties directly inside Yaong-i with low-latency previews.

motion.description: Trigger smooth ambient animations that react when the room hits new streaks, meows, or milestones.

faker.description: Spin up playful sample profiles for testing layouts or onboarding friends without exposing real info.

iconify.description: Access thousands of icons to give channels personality and keep notifications fun.

unpic.description: Share lossless photos and scans so every sticker, doodle, and screenshot looks sharp on OLED screens.

AdminHome.title: Host console
AdminHome.description: Pick a panel to check room health, drop announcements, or invite new moderators.

AdminPush.title: Send announcements
AdminPush.description: Schedule monochrome toasts or long-form updates for your community.
AdminPush.placeholder: Share what‚Äôs new with your members‚Ä¶

AdminUsers.title: Moderator roster
AdminUsers.description: Manage who can help run your rooms and adjust their permissions.

WorkspaceContacts.title: Contact hub
WorkspaceContacts.headline: Keep friends close to every chat
WorkspaceContacts.description: Profiles stay beside every message so the story never leaves the chat.

spotlight.body: Live translation saved 280 minutes this morning and helped 63% of members join conversations outside their primary language.
